metadata.description:
Meet Dimitri Vegas and Like Mike, two young DJs -- and the public faces of
the world-renowned TomorrowLand electronic music festival - as they are
drawn into an impossible adventure... to save Creativity!

Over the course of this retina-blasting fantasy adventure, the pair will
find themselves sucked into an eternal war between two worlds - and into a
battle waged between the forces of Creation and Destruction. Can two DJs
turn the tide over the course of just one music festival?

There's only one sure way to find out!
metadata.name: TomorrowLand
